stats.description: OrlegiTech uses artificial intelligence, aerial analysis, and real-time control to help golf courses maintain optimal turf conditions and manage their resources more efficiently.

features.4: Everything from your mobile or tablet.

features.1: Get NDVI, NDRE maps and turf status in minutes.
features.2: Detect water stress, weak areas and real maintenance needs.

features.3: Safety and efficiency on the course

description.2: At OrlegiTech we combine agronomy, artificial intelligence and aerial analysis to improve the performance of each course. Our goal is to help you keep the turf in optimal condition, reduce operating costs and facilitate daily staff planning.
description.3: We work with greenkeepers, club directors and maintenance teams to transform complex data into clear decisions. Our system adapts to each course according to budget, category, climate and available resources.
